price: 50 leur ôtant toute possibilité de laisser des recommandations ou de regagner leurs foyers.
arabic: فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ تَوۡصِيَةٗ وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: falā yastaṭīʿūna tawṣiyatan walā ilā ahlihim yarjiʿūna
